item.title: Leader election using Raft
item.description: In my previous posts I’ve been working on a basic key-value store, using a write-ahead log, and replicating its data across several replicas (see posts on WAL, and replication)). This version had a hardcoded leader handling all writes, and sending the data to the followers, but had several shortcomings, the main one among them was that the configuration had to include which node is the leader. If the leader dies, the cluster can’t do any work, doesn’t matter how many nodes remain.
